alert.note: Alert for ASZ003; Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued April 21 at 3:25PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT... THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN PAGO PAGO HAS EXTENDED THE * FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR ALL AMERICAN SAMOA * THROUGH SUNDAY * OCCASIONAL SHOWERS WITH LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL AND THUNDERSTORMS ARE EXPECTED THROUGH THE WEEKEND. CLOUDS AND RAINFALL ACTIVITY ASSOCIATED WITH TROPICAL CYCLONE AMOS WILL MOVE ACROSS THE REGION AND THE POTENTIAL FOR FLASH FLOODING WILL CONTINUE THROUGH SUNDAY. O LE A FAAAUAU PEA LE NOFO VAAVAAIA MO LOLOGA MA TAFEGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 325 AOAULI ASO TOFI APERILA 21 2016 UA IAI NEI SE * O LE A FAAAUAU PEA LE NOFO VAAVAAIA MO LOLOGA MA TAFEGA TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS * SEIA OO I LE ASO SA * E TOULU TIMUGA MA E MAMAFA I NI ISI O TAIMI...FAAPEA FO`I LE TAAPE O FAITITILI E OO ATU I LE FAAIUGA O LE VAIASO. O FAAPUTUGA AO MA TIMUGA MAI MATAGI MALOLOSI O AMOS O LE A AGA`I MAI I LE ATUNUU MA E MAFAI ONA FAATUPULAIA AI LOLOGA MA TAFEGA FAAPEA SOLOGA. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O LE UIGA O LE NOFO VAAVAAIA MO LOLOGA MA TAFEGA PE A FAI O LE A OO MAI UIGA LOULOUA O LE TAU E MAFAI AI ONA FAATUPULAIA NI SOLOGA MAI MAUGA PO O ELEELE...PE MAFUA AI FO`I LOLOGA MA TAFEGA. E TATAU LAVA ONA TAPENA MA FAAFOFOGA I LE LETIO MO TALA O LE TAU AE MAISE AI PE A IAI SE FAAILO MO LAPATAIGA MO LOLOGA MA TAFEGA.
info.instruction: A FLASH FLOOD WATCH MEANS THAT CONDITIONS MAY DEVELOP THAT LEAD TO FLASH FLOODING. FLASH FLOODING IS A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION. PLEASE MONITOR LATER FORECASTS AND BE PREPARED TO TAKE ACTION SHOULD FLASH FLOOD WARNINGS BE ISSUED.
